author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Tidewater Quarterly Loss Per Share $1.67
text:
May 14 (Reuters) - Tidewater Inc:
* TIDEWATER REPORTS RESULTS FOR THE THREE MONTHS ENDED MARCH 31, 2018
* QUARTERLY LOSS PER SHARE $1.67 * QUARTERLY REVENUE $91.5 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
